title: Fantasy Football Breakdown With Daniel Dopp
description:
Adam starts off this week's podcast with a few updates regarding Deshaun Watson. Then, he is joined by his former producer turned Fantasy Football Focus co-host Daniel Dopp to discuss his career path at ESPN. Then, Dopp breaks down the keys to drafting a successful fantasy team, sleeper picks to keep an eye on, and the top league winners for this year.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
